title: Vagrant plugins cannot be installed anymore for vagrant 2.4.2
body:
<!--
Please note that the Vagrant issue tracker is reserved for bug reports. For general usage questions, please use
HashiCorp Discuss, https://discuss.hashicorp.com/c/vagrant/.

When you submit a bug report, please provide the minimal configuration and required information necessary to reliably reproduce the issue. It
should include a basic Vagrantfile.

Thank you!
-->
In the **Debug output** and **Steps to reproduce** `vagrant-env` plugin is used, but that happened to other plugins I am using (`vagrant-disksize` and `vagrant-vbguest`) as well as picking some random plugins from [here](https://github.com/hashicorp/vagrant/wiki/Available-Vagrant-Plugins).

It seems that adding the dependency of logger ([this PR](https://github.com/hashicorp/vagrant/pull/13499)) breaks the installation of (probably) all plugins under Windows.

When opening a `cmd` in `C:\Program Files\Vagrant\embedded\mingw64\bin` and run `gem search -be logger`

```
C:\Program Files\Vagrant\embedded\mingw64\bin>gem search -be logger

*** LOCAL GEMS ***

logger (1.6.0)

*** REMOTE GEMS ***

logger (1.6.1)

```

### Debug output

<!--
Provide a link to a GitHub Gist containing the complete debug output, https://www.vagrantup.com/docs/other/debugging.html. 

The debug output should
be very long. Do NOT paste the debug output in the issue.
-->
https://gist.github.com/dib42/7113c057c40dac93760afe4b813cb763

### Expected behavior

<!--
What should have happened?
-->
Vagrant should install the plugin

### Actual behavior

<!--
What actually happened?
-->
Vagrant does not install the plugin because of a ruby dependency problem

### Reproduction information 

#### Vagrant version

<!--
Use `vagrant -v` to collect the version information. If you are not running the latest version
of Vagrant, please upgrade before submitting an issue.
-->
Vagrant 2.4.2


#### Host operating system

<!--
Your local system.
-->
Windows 10 22H2

#### Guest operating system

<!--
The operating system of the virtual machine.
-->
Ubuntu 22.04

#### Steps to reproduce

1. Open powershell
2. Run `vagrant plugin install vagrant-env --verbose --debug-timestamp`

#### Vagrantfile
Just for the bug report requirements, as this is not relevant for the bug

```ruby
# Copy-paste your Vagrantfile here. Remove any sensitive information such as passwords, authentication tokens, or email addresses.
Vagrant.configure("2") do |config|
  config.vm.box = "ubuntu/jammy64"
end
```


<!--
Always start with a minimal Vagrantfile and include only the relevant configuration
to reproduce the reported behavior.
-->
